GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v5.10.164
GSD.description:
drm/msm/dp: do not complete dp_aux_cmd_fifo_tx() if irq is not for aux transfer

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.164 by commit 785607e5e6fb52caf141e4580de40405565f04f1, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit c943b4948b5848fc0e07f875edbd35a973879e22. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/msm/dp: do not complete dp_aux_cmd_fifo_tx() if irq is not for aux transfer
